about_the_game:
After the announcement of a nuclear attack, the protagonist grabs what’s necessary and races to an underground fallout shelter, trying to survive in a harsh, post-apocalyptic world. In this game, you will experience the brutal realities of survival, where every decision matters.

  • Realistic Survival Mechanics:
    Manage food and water intake, as every item affects your health in different ways. Poor choices can lead to deteriorating mental health.

  • Mental Health System:
    Your psychological state is just as important as your physical health. Pay attention to your mental well-being by resting, taking medications, or listening to music. Neglecting this can lead to severe consequences.

  • Exploration:
    The shelter isn’t as small as it seems. Explore every corner to find resources, hidden secrets, and essential items that could be the difference between life and death.

  • Fuel Management:
    Keep the shelter’s generator running by finding and using fuel. Without it, the shelter’s systems could fail, leaving you in the dark.

  • Maintenance:
    The flashlight’s battery life and other important devices need regular attention. Make sure you have replacements when necessary, or face the consequences of malfunctioning equipment.

    • Food and Water Impact:
      Each food or drink item affects your health differently. Pay attention to what you eat to avoid health issues that can affect your survival chances.

    • Music for Sanity:
      Listening to music helps maintain your sanity. Explore the shelter to find radios or other devices that can play tunes, keeping your mind intact.

    • Deteriorating Environment:
      Time is a critical factor. As you stay in the shelter, your supplies and energy will dwindle. You must constantly adapt and make smart choices to stay alive.
detailed_description:
After the announcement of a nuclear attack, the protagonist grabs what’s necessary and races to an underground fallout shelter, trying to survive in a harsh, post-apocalyptic world. In this game, you will experience the brutal realities of survival, where every decision matters.

  • Realistic Survival Mechanics:
    Manage food and water intake, as every item affects your health in different ways. Poor choices can lead to deteriorating mental health.

  • Mental Health System:
    Your psychological state is just as important as your physical health. Pay attention to your mental well-being by resting, taking medications, or listening to music. Neglecting this can lead to severe consequences.

  • Exploration:
    The shelter isn’t as small as it seems. Explore every corner to find resources, hidden secrets, and essential items that could be the difference between life and death.

  • Fuel Management:
    Keep the shelter’s generator running by finding and using fuel. Without it, the shelter’s systems could fail, leaving you in the dark.

  • Maintenance:
    The flashlight’s battery life and other important devices need regular attention. Make sure you have replacements when necessary, or face the consequences of malfunctioning equipment.

    • Food and Water Impact:
      Each food or drink item affects your health differently. Pay attention to what you eat to avoid health issues that can affect your survival chances.

    • Music for Sanity:
      Listening to music helps maintain your sanity. Explore the shelter to find radios or other devices that can play tunes, keeping your mind intact.

    • Deteriorating Environment:
      Time is a critical factor. As you stay in the shelter, your supplies and energy will dwindle. You must constantly adapt and make smart choices to stay alive.
name: Constant Pressure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-4300
  • Memory: 4 GB GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 / NVIDIA GT 710 / AMD Radeon HD 5450
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek ALC887 or equivalent (DirectX compatible)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 260X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek ALC1220 or equivalent (DirectX compatible)

short_description: After a nuclear attack is announced, survive in a fallout shelter by managing food, water, and mental health. Explore, maintain the generator, repair devices, and face survival challenges in a brutal post-apocalyptic world.
supported_languages:
English*, Polish
*languages with full audio support
